channel.title: Ini file on RoosTech
channel.description: Recent content in Ini file on RoosTech

item.title: Introducing the IniManager module
item.description: Some time ago I wanted to find a DSC resource which would help me in configuring ini files. I did not really find any resource which was dynamic enough for my needs so I ended up writing my own. Since I want my DSC resources to contain as little code as possible I prefer to create cmdlets outside of the resource which I can call from within the resource. In this way I can also use the cmdlets in scripts and the console which is a nice bonus.
